original: 原為蜀將，隨姜維伐魏時，受命前驅築城堅守，但被魏將陳泰用計斷絕糧道，缺糧投降。後鍾會伐蜀時，以降將身分參戰。
text: Originally a general of Shu, when Jiang Wei defeated Wei, he was ordered to advance to build a city and stick to it, but Chen Tai, a general of Wei, cut off the grain road and surrendered without grain. When Houzhong will defeat Shu, he will join the war since then.
